## IGlCamera2dBinder interface

Provides coordinate system invariant WebGL bindings for 2d graphics components.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IGlCamera2dBinder<TBinderData, TUpdateArg> extends IGlBinder<TGlBasicComponentRenderer, TBinderData> 
```
